title: Food App
description: A food delivery app clone built using react native, all the states inside the app are managed using redux.

title: Websocket Microservices
description: Developed a WebSocket service using Spring Boot and Go, comparing their performance and the amount of boilerplate code required for implementation.

title: Wordle React App
description: Wordle is a popular word puzzle game where players have five attempts to guess a five-letter word. With each guess, the game provides feedback by highlighting letters in green, yellow, or gray â€” indicating correct placement, correct letter but wrong position, or incorrect letter, respectively. Its minimal design and brain-teasing simplicity game.

title: Personal Agent Using Llama3
description: Developed a lightweight personal assistant application with integrated Email and Google Meet agents using LLaMA3 and LangChain. The assistant can summarize the user's day from emails and meetings and respond to general-purpose prompts.
